* f thr s n Syndct Kllng rl n th hrrchy,  syndct mmbr s gvn th syndct gn. Whn th plyr wth th syndct gn ds, nthr mmbr f th hrrchy nhrts t.

Plyrs tht r n th syndct hrrchy tnd t ls b syndct nsdrs nd lylsts. Ths mns thy wn by lmntng vry thr tm nd cn tlk tgthr drng nght nd btry.
